pullrequest.title: Convert opende libraries to be static and not installed (->default)

content.raw:
A user can get a pointer to the underlying physics engine, and make modifications. This is not heavily used outside of the research community, however I don't want to eliminate the capability.

This is really just a naming issue, correct?
content.html:
A user can get a pointer to the underlying physics engine, and make modifications. This is not heavily used outside of the research community, however I don't want to eliminate the capability.
